How the gods know whether a person has a: Take a mendicant who is freed both ways
Take a mendicant who is freed by wisdom
Take a mendicant who is a personal witness
Take a mendicant who is attained to view
Take a mendicant who is freed by faith
Take a mendicant who is a follower of the teachings
The qualities of a mendicant that the go: They will associate with good friends
They might realize the supreme culmination of the spiritual path in this very life
They will live having achieved with their own insight the goal for which gentlemen rightly go forth from the lay life to homelessness.
